recommendations: Add these critical missing skills: software engineering experience, in a team/tech lead role, employment type: full-time
Quantify your achievements with numbers, percentages, or metrics
Add education section with relevant degrees or certifications
Use more action verbs to describe your achievements (e.g., 'developed', 'implemented', 'led')
Consider adjusting your job titles to better match the target role

detailed_recommendations.message: Add these critical missing skills: software engineering experience, in a team/tech lead role, employment type: full-time
detailed_recommendations.impact: Could increase keyword match score by 15-25 points
action_steps: Add 'software engineering experience' to your skills section
Add 'in a team/tech lead role' to your skills section
Add 'employment type: full-time' to your skills section
Include these skills in your experience descriptions
Consider taking online courses to gain these skills
examples: Skills: Python, JavaScript, software engineering experience, in a team/tech lead role
Experience: Developed applications using software engineering experience

detailed_recommendations.impact: Experience section is critical for ATS parsing
action_steps: List positions in reverse chronological order
Include job title, company, dates, and location
Add 3-5 bullet points per position
Focus on achievements, not just responsibilities
examples: Software Engineer | Tech Corp | Jan 2020 - Dec 2023 | San Francisco, CA
• Led team of 3 developers in agile environment

detailed_recommendations.message: Quantify your achievements with numbers, percentages, or metrics
detailed_recommendations.impact: Quantified achievements are more compelling and ATS-friendly
action_steps: Add specific numbers to demonstrate impact
Include percentages for improvements
Mention team sizes you managed
Specify budget amounts or revenue generated
examples: Reduced processing time from 2 hours to 15 minutes

detailed_recommendations.message: Add education section with relevant degrees or certifications
detailed_recommendations.impact: Education section may be required for many positions
action_steps: List degree, institution, and graduation year
Include relevant coursework if recent graduate
Add certifications and professional development
Include GPA if 3.5 or higher
examples: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
Relevant Coursework: Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Systems

detailed_recommendations.message: Use more action verbs to describe your achievements (e.g., 'developed', 'implemented', 'led')
detailed_recommendations.impact: Improves ATS parsing and makes resume more compelling
action_steps: Replace passive voice with active voice
Start bullet points with strong action verbs
Use past tense for previous roles, present tense for current role
Quantify achievements with numbers and percentages
examples: Instead of: 'Was responsible for managing team' → 'Led team of 5 developers'
Instead of: 'Helped with project' → 'Delivered project 2 weeks ahead of schedule'
Instead of: 'Worked on application' → 'Developed web application serving 10,000+ users'

detailed_recommendations.message: Consider adjusting your job titles to better match the target role
detailed_recommendations.impact: Better title alignment can improve recruiter attention
action_steps: Review target job title and identify key terms
Adjust your most recent title to include relevant keywords
Use industry-standard job titles when possible
Consider adding alternate titles in parentheses
examples: Current: Software Developer → Target: Job Description Senior Software Engineer Lead

ats_compatibility.description: Your resume is unlikely to pass ATS filters
